QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(p.patient_sk AS BIGINT) AS person_id, [proc].encounter_id, l.procedure_code, [proc].procedure_priority, [proc].procedure_dt_tm FROM {sc}.hf_f_procedure as [proc] JOIN {sc}.hf_f_encounter as e on e.encounter_id = [proc].encounter_id JOIN {sc}.hf_d_patient as p on e.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.patient_sk = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE JOIN {sc}.hf_d_procedure as l on l.procedure_id = [proc].procedure_id order by p.patient_sk
